alert.note: Alert for Kane; Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 2:07PM MDT until August 12 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... West Central Kane County in southern Utah... East Central Washington County in southwestern Utah...Specifically for eastern portions of Zion National Park * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 207 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Clear Creek. Flash flooding is already occurring in Clear Creek and surrounding washes. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Zion National Park Dispatch reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and slot canyons. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Zion National Park. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
